## Client.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `Client` class

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(rpcAddr: string, opts?: ClientOptions);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  rpcAddr | string | the address of the RPC server. |
|  opts | [ClientOptions](./yorkie-js-sdk.clientoptions.md) | _(Optional)_ the options of the client. |
